Uses of Class
gr.forth.ics.graph.path.Traverser.TraverserBuilder

Packages that use Traverser.TraverserBuilder
gr.forth.ics.graph.path   
 

Uses of Traverser.TraverserBuilder in gr.forth.ics.graph.path
 

Methods in gr.forth.ics.graph.path that return Traverser.TraverserBuilder
static Traverser.TraverserBuilder Traverser.newBfs()
          Specifies that breadth-first-search will be used for the traversal of a graph, and returns a builder to further configure that traversal.
static Traverser.TraverserBuilder Traverser.newCustom(Comparator<? super Path> pathComparator)
          Specifies that the traversal will visit the discovered paths using a priority queue with the given path comparator, and returns a builder to further configure that traversal.
static Traverser.TraverserBuilder Traverser.newDfs()
          Specifies that depth-first-search will be used for the traversal of a graph, and returns a builder to further configure that traversal.
 Traverser.TraverserBuilder Traverser.TraverserBuilder.notRepeatingEdges()
          Specifies that during all traversals performed by the Traverser, no path that leads to an already-visited edge will be reported.
 Traverser.TraverserBuilder Traverser.TraverserBuilder.notRepeatingNodes()
          Specifies that during all traversals performed by the Traverser, no path that leads to an already-visited node will be reported.
 Traverser.TraverserBuilder Traverser.TraverserBuilder.notRepeatingNodesExcludingStart()
          Specifies that during all traversals performed by the Traverser, no path that leads to an already-visited node will be reported, but the node from which the traversal starts is not considered to be already "visited" due to that fact; it will only be regarded as visited if there is a cycle (perhaps of length 1) that leads back to it
